attributes.action: Oppose the construction oo the planned third runway at Heathrow.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the plans for Heathrow expantion go ahead, then the enviromental impact will be huge. Not only will there be increased CO2 emmissions, but there will be more noise pollution and visual pollution. 

Also an entire community would be obliterated and large amounts green belt land lost.

Is it not slightly hypocritical of our goverment to introduce emissions targets and then expand an already massive airport??

Lets send a clear message to the PM that Heathrow expantion would be disasterous for wild life, the climate, the country side and local people.

NO THIRD RUNWAY!
